name: @dcrichards/alexamonzo
description: An Alexa skill for interacting with Monzo

scripts.lambda: aws lambda update-function-code --region us-east-1 --function-name AlexaMonzo --s3-bucket monzoalexa --s3-key lib.zip
scripts.deploy: npm run archive && npm run s3 && npm run lamda

author: DCRichards
